definition: The term refers to a location or direction that is opposite to the front or forward-facing side. It commonly denotes the back or rear part of an object, place, or person. This word is frequently used to describe the position or direction of something in relation to its front or to indicate the opposite side of an object or space.

examples.english: The garden is at the back.
He is sitting in the back of the car.

examples.german: Das Buch liegt hinten auf dem Regal.
examples.english: The book is lying at the back on the shelf.

examples.german: Hinten im Raum steht ein Schreibtisch.
examples.english: There is a desk at the back of the room.
The bus departs from the back.
